Desktop

comment.body:
I don't have an iPhone, but on my end this notice is automatically closed after about 1-2 seconds.
Maybe we can remove old exception rule:
```adblock
@@||usercentrics.eu^$domain=justwatch.com
```

As I recall it was added due to some breakage, though I don't remember what was the reason exactly.
Currently I don't see any problems if I block it by using this rule:
```adblock
||usercentrics.eu^$domain=justwatch.com,important
```

issue.title: Filter in German filter blocks comment section on welt.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.10.0.1272

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.welt.de/politik/deutschland/article245473908/Letzte-Generation-Holen-uns-die-Demokratie-zurueck-Klimaaktivisten-wollen-sozialen-Wendepunkt.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

welt.de recently put their comment section into the DIV section `data-component="Outbrain"` which is blocked by the filter `welt.de##div[data-component="Outbrain"]` in the "AdGuard German filter". The result is that the comment section on welt.de is no longer visible with the German filter active.
I suggest to change this filter to `welt.de##div.Outbrain` which blocks less and hence works with the comments section.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.hulu.com/hub/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Fhub%2Fhome) ### Comment > I love this extension. However, i'm having some issues with Hulu.com. > > When enabling the ad guard on Hulu it blocks all of the ads however two things happen: > > 1. The ads get embedded into the video. So instead of unskippable ad, it gets embedded in the movie/tvshow and I can skip it by using arrow keys (basically fast forwarding using the movie time controls). If the ad started at 12minutes 10seconds, I just skip 30seconds to go to 12minutes 40seconds. Hope this makes sense. I don't mind doing this but the second issue is why I'm writing this. > > 2. The subtitles get out of sync and cannot use the closed captions on Hulu. I think it is because of the hardcoded ads by Hulu when we enable this extension. Is there a way to block the ads but not let Hulu think we've blocked the ads? I'm not technical so I may be grasping at straws here. > > Thanks so much. I hope you guys figure this issue out and resolve it whenever's possible. Appreciate you for making such an awesome plugin. > > ### Screenshots

issue.title: Filter in German filter blocks comment section on welt.de

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.10.0.1272

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.welt.de/politik/deutschland/article245473908/Letzte-Generation-Holen-uns-die-Demokratie-zurueck-Klimaaktivisten-wollen-sozialen-Wendepunkt.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

welt.de recently put their comment section into the DIV section `data-component="Outbrain"` which is blocked by the filter `welt.de##div[data-component="Outbrain"]` in the "AdGuard German filter". The result is that the comment section on welt.de is no longer visible with the German filter active.
I suggest to change this filter to `welt.de##div.Outbrain` which blocks less and hence works with the comments section.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites

- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.10.0.1272

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.welt.de/politik/deutschland/article245473908/Letzte-Generation-Holen-uns-die-Demokratie-zurueck-Klimaaktivisten-wollen-sozialen-Wendepunkt.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

welt.de recently put their comment section into the DIV section `data-component="Outbrain"` which is blocked by the filter `welt.de##div[data-component="Outbrain"]` in the "AdGuard German filter". The result is that the comment section on welt.de is no longer visible with the German filter active.
I suggest to change this filter to `welt.de##div.Outbrain` which blocks less and hence works with the comments section.

comment.body:
You're right, I think I was too fast  apparently they're still actively working on the webpage and realised that laying the comment section inside the Outbrain-section was a bad idea because now it is separate again and the filter works again as intended. I hope it stays that way. 
Sorry for having bothered you!

issue.title: Filter in German filter blocks comment section on welt.de

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.10.0.1272

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.welt.de/politik/deutschland/article245473908/Letzte-Generation-Holen-uns-die-Demokratie-zurueck-Klimaaktivisten-wollen-sozialen-Wendepunkt.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

welt.de recently put their comment section into the DIV section `data-component="Outbrain"` which is blocked by the filter `welt.de##div[data-component="Outbrain"]` in the "AdGuard German filter". The result is that the comment section on welt.de is no longer visible with the German filter active.
I suggest to change this filter to `welt.de##div.Outbrain` which blocks less and hence works with the comments section.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Unfortunately, the reported issue does not satisfy our [filters policy](https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-filter-policy).
This site has too little traffic.

To fix cookie message add to user rules:
`maltiverse.com#%#//scriptlet('set-local-storage-item', 'showCookies', 'false')`

comment.body:
I'm not quite sure if this is used only for ad. Even if so, `2023/05` indicates this is a recent image and we don't know how long it lasts. So please change to cosmetic
```
wikiru.jp##.menubar > a[target="_blank"] > img[width="250"][height="250"]
wikiru.jp##.menubar > a[target="_blank"] + br
```

```

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -2907,7 +2906,7 @@ business2community.com##.sticky_in_parent > div#community
 theblogsmasher.in#?#.wp-block-quote:has(> p > a[href^="https://chat.whatsapp.com/"])
 aws.amazon.com#?#.lb-row > div.lb-col:has(> div.lb-tiny-iblock[style="background-color:#eaeded;"])
 steezy.co#?#div[class^="div-block-"] > div.w-form:has(> form[data-name] > input[type="email"])
-kaspersky.com#?#.c-page > section:has(> section > div.o-container-fluid > div.c-form--newsletter)
+blog.kaspersky.co.jp,blog.kaspersky.kz,kaspersky.co.in,kaspersky.co.uk,kaspersky.co.za,kaspersky.com.au,kaspersky.com.br,kaspersky.com.cn,kaspersky.com.tr,kaspersky.de,kaspersky.es,kaspersky.fr,kaspersky.it,kaspersky.nl,kaspersky.ru,kaspersky.com#?#.c-page > section:has(> section > div.o-container-fluid > div.c-form--newsletter)
comment.body:
```suggestion
kaspersky.*#?#.c-page > section:has(> section > div.o-container-fluid > div.c-form--newsletter)
```
the rule is not dangerous, so `*` can be used.

issue.title: HTTPS certificate confirmation issues of certain applications.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tubemate.net

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Symptoms
 When using some application, inform shown below shows and ads won't be blocked or cannot use application at all.

For now, 2 applications majorly that I use is the problem.
1) Tubemate : 
https://tubemate.net
2) SPOTV NOW : 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.co.spotvnow.app&hl=ko&gl=US&referrer=utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dorganic%26utm_term%3Dspotvnow&pcampaignid=APPU_1_VuZrZOySGcOK-Qbgg79o

Especially for the second version, I think this app detects adguard and blocks connection itself when using adguard.

2. Screenshots
<details>
<summary>App does not approve HTTPS certificate</summary>

![Screenshot_20230523-065714_Chrome](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/36753565/6c5c7c75-97c7-4376-854d-6278f3f55330)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
